data.title: Knowing Me, Knowing You with Alan Partridge podcast
data.text:
Spoof chat show starring Steve Coogan as host Alan Partridge

With thanks to Alan's researchers: Steve Coogan, Patrick Marber, Rebecca Front, Doon Mackichan and David Schneider. Produced by Armando Iannucci. First broadcast on BBC Radio 4 in December 1992.

Episode 1 guests: novelist Lawrence Camley, feminist Ally Tennant and Carnaby Street's Mr Boutique, Adam Wells.

Episode 2 guests: nine-year-old prodigy Simon Fisher, American hypnotist, Janey Katz and controversial lawyer Nick Ford.

Episode 3 guests: France's second-best racing driver Michel Lambert and saucy East End glamour girl Shirley Dee.

Episode 4 guests: the Duchess of Stranraer, impressionist Steve Thompson and MP Sandra Peaks.

Episode 5 guests: Hollywood star couple Sally Hoff and Conrad Knight, New York comic Bernie Rosen and professional gambler Jack 'the Black Cat' Colson.

Episode 6 guests: BBC TV's Commissioning Director Tony Hayers, TV presenter Trudy Sky, fashion designer Yvonne Boyd and the maverick Lord Morgan.
